meanings: Noun 귀 (→cauliflower ear, glue ear, middle ear)
Noun (1년 열두 달로 이뤄진) 해[년/연] (→leap year, new year)
Noun 1년[한 해](라는 기간) (→gap year, light year, off year)
Noun 청각, 청력, 음의 식별력, 음감

해피 뉴 이어! Happy new year! 듣기 View video GOT7 : 💚

vlive.korean: 한번 이어달리기 해볼까요? 이제 또 누가 올까 한번 기다려볼까요? Shall we do a relay? And wait to see who will come next? 듣기 View video SF9 : 얘드라일어나바
vlive.english: Shall we do a relay? And wait to see who will come next?

vlive.korean: 저희가 순서가 맨 마지막이어가지고 계속 있었는데 - 저도 계속 이 떨고... We were the last ones to go, so we just kept waiting. - My jaws were trembling too. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP47. 아육대에 있지!
vlive.english: We were the last ones to go, so we just kept waiting. - My jaws were trembling too.
